patch.data:
• Bolt (Q)
    • This ability no longer allows Moya to go through walls and will now cause her to slide along them if attempting to go through a wall.
  • Shock (W)
    • The Basic Attack Damage bonus granted by activating this ability has been changed to 15/20/25/30/35, from 10/18/26/34/42.
  • Recharge (E)
    • The Basic Attack Damage bonus granted by activating this ability has been changed to 15/20/25/30/35, from 10/18/26/34/42.
    • The damage boost when using Bolt (Q) while using this ability has been reduced to 35/50/65/80/95, down from 35/55/75/95/115.
    • The damage boost power ratio when using Bolt (Q) while this ability is active has been reduced to 0.3, down from 0.35.
  • Landfall (R)
    • The base damage of this ability has been reduced to 200/300/400, down from 250/350/450.

• Jagged Volley (E)
    • The slow applied by this ability has been increased to 30/35/40/45/50%, up from 20/25/30/35/40%.
  • Splintering Spines (R)
    • This ability now grants Vex 20% increased basic attack range for the duration of the ability.

• Spiritstone of the Outrider
    • The movespeed buff granted by this Spiritstone will now deactivate when upon entering combat, rather than only upon the user dealing damage.

• Spiritstone of the Ravager
    • The Bonus Power granted by this Spiristone while in combat has been reduced to 7 to 26 (based on level), down from 8 to 29.
    • The passive ability of this Spiritstone now only stacks while dealing damage has opposed to dealing and receiving damage.
    • The time it takes for this passive ability to deactivate has been reduced to 3 seconds, down from 5.

• Spiritstone of the Reaper
    • The Power bonus awarded by this Spiritstone after scoring a kill or assist has been increased to 30, up from 25.

• Red Spiritstone of Armor Growth
    • The Armor granted by this Spiritstone has been reduced to 6.6%, down from 11%.

• Red Spiritstone of Resist Growth
    • The Magic Resistance granted by this Spiritstone has been reduced to 6.6%, down from 11%.

• Red Spark of Armor
    • The Armor granted by this Spark has been increased to 1, up from 0.7.

• Red Spark of Armor Growth
    • The Armor granted by this Spark has been reduced to 0.7%, down from 1.2%.

• Red Spark of Magic Resist
    • The Magic Resist granted by this Spark has been increased to 1, up from 0.7.

• Red Spark of Magic Resistance Growth
    • The Magic Resistance granted by this Spark has been reduced to 0.7%, down from 1.2%.

General
  • All Shapers will now cost 800 Destiny, up from 240.
  • Spiritstones and Sparks have had their prices adjusted.
  • End of game Destiny awards have been adjusted.
  • The Blessing drop rates have been tuned slightly.
